keyMoments.moment: Enel uses the fruit's electrical powers to instantly defeat Sanji
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the overwhelming offensive capability of the Lightning Logia

keyMoments.moment: Enel electrocutes Usopp, leaving him smoking and appearing dead
keyMoments.significance: Shows the lethal nature of Enel's electrical attacks

keyMoments.moment: Luffy declares that cannons and rifles won't work on his rubber body
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces rubber immunity to conventional weapons

keyMoments.moment: Luffy is nearly incinerated by Wyper's fire-based Burn Bazooka
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that fire attacks can harm Luffy despite rubber immunity

keyMoments.moment: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Bazooka against Wyper
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates signature technique in intense combat
